languages.text: "Годы потребуются Воинам Алайтока, чтобы отыскать Врата Паутины, способные привести их разящие силы в Простор. Быть может, ты будешь уже слишком стар{mf||а} к тому времени, и на смертном одре услышишь весть — Дети Азуриана прибыли, дабы свершить возмездие".

traits.locale_text: "Годы потребуются Войнам Алайтока, чтобы отыскать Врата Паутины, способные привести их разящие силы в Простор. Быть может, ты будешь уже слишком стар{mf||а} к тому времени, и на смертном одре услышишь весть — Дети Азуриана прибыли, дабы свершить возмездие".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "It will take the Warriors of Alaitoc many years to discover the Webway Gate capable of bringing their strike force to the Expanse. Perhaps you will be too old by then, and only on your deathbed will you hear the news — the Children of Asuryan have come to exact their vengeance."
languages.original_text: "Годы потребуются Воинам Алайтока, чтобы отыскать Врата Паутины, способные привести их разящие силы в Простор. Быть может, ты будешь уже слишком стар{mf||а} к тому времени, и на смертном одре услышишь весть — Дети Азуриана прибыли, дабы свершить возмездие".

traits.locale_text: "It will take the Warriors of Alaitoc many years to discover the Webway Gate capable of bringing their strike force into the Expanse. Perhaps you will be too old by then, and on your deathbed you will hear the tidings of the Children of Asuryan coming to exact their vengeance."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It will take the Warriors of Alaitoc many years to discover the Webway Gate capable of bringing their strike force into the Expanse. Perhaps you will be too old by then, and on your deathbed you will hear the tidings of the Children of Asuryan coming to exact their vengeance."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It will take the Warriors of Alaitoc many years to discover the Webway Gate capable of bringing their strike force into the Expanse. Perhaps you will be too old by then, and on your deathbed you will hear the tidings of the Children of Asuryan coming to exact their vengeance."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It will take the Warriors of Alaitoc many years to discover the Webway Gate capable of bringing their strike force into the Expanse. Perhaps you will be too old by then, and on your deathbed you will hear the tidings of the Children of Asuryan coming to exact their vengeance."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It will take the Warriors of Alaitoc many years to discover the Webway Gate capable of bringing their strike force to the Expanse. Perhaps you will be too old by then, and only on your deathbed will you hear the news — the Children of Asuryan have come to exact their vengeance."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It will take the Warriors of Alaitoc many years to discover the Webway Gate capable of bringing their strike force to the Expanse. Perhaps you will be too old by then, and only on your deathbed will you hear the news — the Children of Asuryan have come to exact their vengeance."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Los guerreros de Alaitoc tardarán muchos años en encontrar un portal en la Telaraña capaz de traer toda su fuerza de asalto a la Extensión. Quizá para entonces ya seas muy {mf|viejo|vieja}, y solo en tu lecho de muerte te llegue la noticia de que los hijos de Asuryan han llegado para cobrarse su venganza».
languages.original_text: "It will take the Warriors of Alaitoc many years to discover the Webway Gate capable of bringing their strike force to the Expanse. Perhaps you will be too old by then, and only on your deathbed will you hear the news — the Children of Asuryan have come to exact their vengeance."

traits.locale_text: «Los guerreros de Alaitoc tardarán muchos años en encontrar un portal en la Telaraña capaz de traer toda su fuerza de asalto a la Extensión. Quizá para entonces ya seas muy {mf|viejo|vieja}, y en tu lecho de muerte te llegue la noticia de que los hijos de Asuryan han llegado para cobrarse venganza».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “阿莱托克的战士们要花上很多很多年的时间，才能将他们的攻击舰队从网道带到科罗努斯扩区。或许那个时候，你已经老态龙钟了，或许只有到了你临终的时候，你才会听到阿苏焉之子前来报仇的消息。”
languages.original_text: "It will take the Warriors of Alaitoc many years to discover the Webway Gate capable of bringing their strike force to the Expanse. Perhaps you will be too old by then, and only on your deathbed will you hear the news — the Children of Asuryan have come to exact their vengeance."

traits.locale_text: “阿莱托克的战士们要花上很多很多年的时间，才能将他们的攻击舰队从网道带到科罗努斯扩区。或许那个时候，你已经老得不行了，或许只有到了你临终的时候，你才会听到阿苏焉之子前来报仇的消息。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Il faudra de nombreuses années aux guerriers d'Alaitoc pour trouver le portail sur la Toile qui leur permettra d'envoyer leur force d'intervention dans les Étendues. D'ici là, vous serez peut-être sur votre lit de mort lorsque vous apprendrez que les enfants d'Asuryan sont venus assouvir leur vengeance. »
languages.original_text: "It will take the Warriors of Alaitoc many years to discover the Webway Gate capable of bringing their strike force to the Expanse. Perhaps you will be too old by then, and only on your deathbed will you hear the news — the Children of Asuryan have come to exact their vengeance."

traits.locale_text: « Il faudra de nombreuses années aux guerriers d'Alaitoc pour trouver le portail sur la Toile qui leur permettra d'envoyer leur force d'intervention dans les Étendues. D'ici là, vous serez peut-être sur votre lit de mort lorsque vous apprendrez que les enfants d'Asuryan sont venus assouvir leur vengeance. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「アライトクの戦士たちが、彼らの攻撃部隊をエクスパンスに送り込むことのできる網辻門を発見するまでには、長い年月を要するだろう。おそらく、その頃には、あなたはずいぶんな高齢になっているはずだ。そして死に際にアシュリアンの御子らが復讐にやってきたという知らせを聞くだろう」
languages.original_text: "It will take the Warriors of Alaitoc many years to discover the Webway Gate capable of bringing their strike force to the Expanse. Perhaps you will be too old by then, and only on your deathbed will you hear the news — the Children of Asuryan have come to exact their vengeance."

traits.locale_text: 「アライトクの戦士たちが、彼らの攻撃部隊をエクスパンスに送り込むことのできる網辻門を発見するまでには、長い年月を要するだろう。おそらく、その頃には、あなたはずいぶんな高齢になっているはずだ。そして死に際にアシュリアンの御子らが復讐にやってきたという知らせを聞くだろう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Die Krieger von Alaitoc werden viele Jahre brauchen, um das Netzportal zu entdecken, das ihren Einsatzverband in die Ausdehnung bringen kann. Vielleicht seid Ihr bis dahin alt und hört erst auf Eurem Sterbebett, dass die Kinder von Asuryan gekommen sind, um ihre Rache zu nehmen."
languages.original_text: "It will take the Warriors of Alaitoc many years to discover the Webway Gate capable of bringing their strike force to the Expanse. Perhaps you will be too old by then, and only on your deathbed will you hear the news — the Children of Asuryan have come to exact their vengeance."

traits.locale_text: "Die Krieger von Alaitoc werden viele Jahre brauchen, um das Netzportal zu entdecken, das ihren Einsatzverband in die Ausdehnung bringen kann. Vielleicht seid Ihr bis dahin alt und hört auf Eurem Sterbebett, dass die Kinder von Asuryan kommen, um ihre Rache zu nehmen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Saldırı kuvvetlerini Enginlik'e getirebilecek yetide bir Ağyol Geçidi keşfetmek, Alaitoc Savaşçıları'nın yıllarını alacaktır. Belki o zamana yaşın çoktan geçmiş olur ve ölüm döşeğindeyken haberleri alırsın. Asuryan'ın Çocukları, intikamlarını almaya muhakkak ki gelecek."
languages.original_text: "It will take the Warriors of Alaitoc many years to discover the Webway Gate capable of bringing their strike force to the Expanse. Perhaps you will be too old by then, and only on your deathbed will you hear the news — the Children of Asuryan have come to exact their vengeance."

traits.locale_text: "Saldırı kuvvetlerini Enginlik'e getirebilecek yetide bir Ağyol Geçidi keşfetmek, Alaitoc Savaşçılarının pek çok yılını alacaktır. Belki o zamana yaşın çoktan geçmiş olur ve ölüm döşeğindeyken haberleri alırsın. Asuryan'ın Çocukları, intikamlarını almaya muhakkak ki gelecekler."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
